attributes.additional_details:
Phasing out by end of the year be too late for Ukraine, it will be rubble.  We have far less reliance on Russian oil, energy than other European countries. To help Ukraine now, I am prepared to suffer higher prices at the pumps and associated price rises. 
This is the least we can do as U.K citizens to stand up say we are happy to bear this cost, as costs to others are far greater by paying with their lives.
attributes.background: Ban now, in support of the U.S oil ban.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610289
